item.title: fact checking dark humor
item.description: So my friend and I were discussing the general topic of what happens to our employability as people once we reach the age of retirement. My feelings on this are I am hopeful and I think people can retain their skills and probably express different kinds of skills too. (some call this wisdom =D ). At this point my friend introduced some dark humor, citing this link with an actuarial table, saying that,
